# Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(survey)
library(srvyr)
```


# Load data

```{r}
home_walk_trips <- here("NHTS",
              "trippub.csv") %>%
  read_csv() %>%
  filter(TRPTRANS == "01",
         WHYFROM == "01" | WHYFROM == "02",
         WHYTO != "01") %>%
  select(WHYTO, WHYFROM, WTTRDFIN)
```


```{r}
trips_svy <- home_walk_trips %>%
  as_survey(weights = WTTRDFIN)
```

```{r}
summary <-  trips_svy %>%
  group_by(WHYTO) %>%
  survey_tally() %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) 

summary %>%
  mutate(pct = n * 100 / sum(n))
```
